title: Single-file execution
summary: Run single-file Java programs directly without javac.
explanation: The Java launcher can compile and run a single source file in one command. Combined with shebang support on Unix, Java files can work as scripts. No separate compilation step needed.

whyModernWins.title: One command
whyModernWins.desc: java File.java compiles and runs in one step.

whyModernWins.title: Script-like
whyModernWins.desc: Add a shebang line to make .java files executable scripts.

whyModernWins.title: Learning-friendly
whyModernWins.desc: Newcomers run code immediately without learning build tools.
